select_day_or_period_of_stay: Select the day or period of your stay in Białka Tatrzańska.
enter_number_of_participants_adult: Enter the number of people aged 17 and over
enter_number_of_participants_children: Enter the number of children aged 4 to 16
enter_preferences_details: Enter the details of each participant and select the appropriate level of proficiency.
name: Name
firstime_info: Complete beginner, never tried skiing or snowboarding
novice_info: Can make basic turns and slow down
intermediate_info: Can turn confidently and ride various slopes
advanced_info: Experienced rider looking to perfect technique and style
orange_group_info: First steps on skis, goes straight, can't turn
bronze_group_info: First turns, brakes, rides T-bar lift
silver_group_info: Turns confidently, rides red slopes, controls speed
gold_group_info: Rides parallel, skis with poles, independently uses chairlifts
diamond_group_info: Carves on edges, rides with different radius, rides in all conditions
yellow_snowboard_info: Takes first steps, slides on one edge, can't turn
wide_snowboard_info: Has basics, masters turns, rides on both edges
narrow_snowboard_info: Turns confidently, handles red slopes, rides with different radius, rides in all conditions
min_child_age: The minimum age is 4 years old. For children aged 3+, please contact us
please_fill_required_fields: Please fill in the required fields
select_classes_subtitle: Select a participant to book a class for them:
select_classes_for_each_participant: Select classes on selected days for each participant
timer_info: Your reservations will remain active for:
cart_subtitle:
Check that your order is correct
and add any additional services.
search_only_with_prev_instructor: Search only classes with previously selected instructor
instructor_not_available: Selected instructor is not available for this duration on the selected day.
no_classes_found: No classes found with given parameters
contact_customer_service_info: If you haven't found a matching offer, contact our
select_max_3_participants: Select up to three participants with similar preferences to participate in the classes.
delete_class_confirmation: Are you sure you want to remove classes from your schedule?
insurance_for_all_option: Add accident insurance to all classes for all participants.
group_classes_description: Group classes consist of a series of lessons lasting several days. After selecting classes, each of the lessons spread over several days will be added to your calendar.
child_specialists_description: Search only for instructors specially trained to teach the youngest.
animations_description: Animations that allow children to enjoy valuable and safe time. After physical activities, children participate in other integration games with creative providers. The program is adapted to age and interests, and the whole is complemented by a light meal.
book_more_info: To book classes for more than 8 people, please contact us
time_expire_warning: The time to complete your booking is about to expire!
i_declare_that_i_have_read_and_accept_th: I declare that I have read and accept the regulations
added_5_minutes: 5 minutes added to your reservation time
discounts_info: Discounts (customer card, happy hours, hourly packages) cannot be combined – the most favourable one applies.
insurance_included: Accident insurance included in the package.
